61.title: Bulletgirl
61.author: [No author]
notes: Begins: "The frightening echo of uncanny laughter resounds through the halls of a famous comedian's peculiar house! The threat of a horrible death hangs over the head of a man whose job it is to make people laugh! To meet the challenge of a maniac killer, Bulletman, with Bulletgirl at his side, swings into furious action!"

62.title: Bulletgirl
62.author: [No author]
notes: Begins: Who is Mr. Who? Who is the mysterious marauder who glides in like a ghost, tangles your tongue, twists your brain, and vanishes again with mocking laughter? How can Bulletman and Bulletgirl trap Mr. Who, when they don't know who Who is?"

152.title: Bulletman
152.author: [No author]
notes: Begins: "The frightening echo of uncanny laughter resounds through the halls of a famous comedian's peculiar house! The threat of a horrible death hangs over the head of a man whose job it is to make people laugh! To meet the challenge of a maniac killer, Bulletman, with Bulletgirl at his side, swings into furious action!"

153.title: Bulletman
153.author: [No author]
notes: Begins: Who is Mr. Who? Who is the mysterious marauder who glides in like a ghost, tangles your tongue, twists your brain, and vanishes again with mocking laughter? How can Bulletman and Bulletgirl trap Mr. Who, when they don't know who Who is?"
